statements: SELECT * FROM attendance_records;
SELECT employee_id, shift_date, shift_start_time FROM attendance_records;
SELECT id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM attendance_records;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY shift_date DESC, shift_start_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM attendance_records GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_shifts DESC
SELECT SUM(DATEDIFF(shift_end_time, shift_start_time)) AS total_hours_worked FROM attendance_records
SELECT employee_id, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, shift_start_time, shift_end_time)) AS avg_shift_duration FROM attendance_records GROUP BY employee_id

SELECT employee_id, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM attendance_records WHERE shift_date >= '2022-01-01' AND shift_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY employee_id, shift_date ASC, shift_start_time ASC
SELECT id, member_id, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM attendance_records;
SELECT member_id, check_in_time, check_out_time, id FROM attendance_records;
SELECT shift_start_time, shift_end_time, member_id, id FROM shift_schedules;
SELECT id, member_id FROM shift_schedules;
SELECT check_in_time, check_out_time, id, member_id FROM attendance_records;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE member_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, check_in_time FROM attendance_records WHERE check_out_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM shift_schedules WHERE shift_start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, member_id, shift_start_time FROM shift_schedules ORDER BY shift_start_time DESC;
SELECT id, member_id, shift_end_time FROM shift_schedules WHERE shift_end_time < NOW();
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, position FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT member_name, attendance_status FROM team_members JOIN attendance ON team_members.member_id = attendance.member_id;
SELECT member_name, position FROM team_members WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT shift_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE shift_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, position FROM team_members WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_status IN ('Present', 'Late') ORDER BY shift_id ASC;

SELECT team_members.member_id, member_name, position, shift_date, start_time, end_time, attendance_status FROM team_members JOIN shifts ON team_members.member_id = shifts.member_id JOIN attendance ON team_members.member_id = attendance.member_id WHERE attendance_status = 'Absent';
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE shift_id = 2;
SELECT record_id, attendance_status FROM attendance_records WHERE member_id = 3;
SELECT coverage_id, required_staff_count FROM staffing_coverage WHERE shift_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT shift_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT s.shift_id, s.shift_date, tm.member_name FROM shifts s INNER JOIN team_members tm ON s.shift_id = tm.member_id;
SELECT ar.record_id, tm.member_name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM attendance_records ar INNER JOIN team_members tm ON ar.member_id = tm.member_id INNER JOIN shifts s ON ar.shift_id = s.shift_id;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records;
SELECT employee_id, date, check_in FROM attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 10;
SELECT employee_id, check_in, check_out FROM attendance_records WHERE date = '2022-05-12';
SELECT * FROM shifts ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead_id, team_member_count FROM teams WHERE team_member_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT employee_id, name, email FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM shifts ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, date, shift_id FROM schedules WHERE date > '2022-09-01' AND date < '2022-09-30';
SELECT team_name, team_lead_id, team_member_count FROM teams WHERE team_member_count > 5 ORDER BY team_member_count DESC;
